Source_3.value: Vegetable puree linked to severe food poisoning outbreak

Free_Text.value: Responsible for an outbreak of diarrhoeal syndrome food poisoning in a nursing home for elderly people in France in March 1998. The strain was isolated at a level of 3×10^5 g−1 from a vegetable purée, and 44 people were ill. Six of the patients had bloody diarrhoea, and three of them died.
